comic.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: amusing you and making you want to laugh
comic.translation[0].definitions[0].note: comic writer/actress/performer etc (=someone who writes or performs things that make you laugh)
comic.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The song provides some comic relief from the intensity of the scene.
comic.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a magazine for children that tells a story using comic strips
comic.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: someone whose job is to tell jokes and make people laugh
